# Visit Us

**Arts & Education at The Hoyt – 124 East Leasure Ave., New Castle, PA 16101**

## Plan Your Visit

The Hoyt Center for the Arts is located within the beautiful North Hill Historic District of New Castle, Pa. Tour our galleries of permanent art collections and rotating international & local exhibits, or tour the 1917 Hoyt West Mansion and explore the history and architecture of New Castle’s “golden age.”

[Plan Your Visit](https://hoytartcenter.org/visit/plan-your-visit/)

## Schedule a Tour

Private tours are available of our 1917 Mansion – The Alex Crawford Hoyt Period House. Take a step back in time and experience the beautiful architecture, design and period correct furniture, art and artifacts!

[Schedule a Tour](https://hoytartcenter.org/visit/scheduleatour/)

## Gift Shop

The Gift Shop specializes in local art by local artists from across the region, offering a selection of pottery, glass, fibers, jewelry, paintings, prints, soaps, lotions, woodcraft and more.

[Gift Shop](https://hoytartcenter.org/visit/gift-shop/)

admission_text:
# Become a Member

No matter who you are or where you come from, you belong here!

When we adopted our mission “to expand and enrich the life of the community through participation in the arts”, we did not have a singular audience in mind. Instead, we pictured programs that appealed to all people regardless of their age, background and lifestyle. Anyone can walk through our doors to see an exhibit, take a class, or attended an event. Anyone can have a sense that they belong here. But don’t take our word for it… [see what others have to say](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOkc31HvGjfL3usocpN4OK7yM65JN2tSz)!

## Choose the Level That’s Right for You.

### Individual Memberships

Our basic memberships – perfect for those looking for specific benefits. Choose the one that best fits your needs and unlock your benefits today.

### Individuals

#### $42/Year

###### Payable as **$3.50/month**

  * Tuition discounts on classes & camps.
  * 10% off at the Gift Shop.
  * Advance notice of Events & Activities.
  * Free admission to Members Week
  * Free Admission to the Period House.

# Arts & Education at The Hoyt

### Art Center, Museum, Education Center, Events & More

## [See](https://hoytartcenter.org/visit/)

[**Explore**](https://hoytartcenter.org/visit/) compelling [**exhibits**](/events/category/exhibitions/), [**collections**](https://hoytartcenter.org/art-artists/permanentcollection/) and [**architecture**](https://hoytartcenter.org/visit/periodhouse/).

## [Learn](https://hoytartcenter.org/learn/)

Discover your potential through **[classes](https://hoytartcenter.org/learn/classes/)** , [**workshops** ](https://hoytartcenter.org/learn/workshops/)and **[camps](https://hoytartcenter.org/learn/artcamp/)**.

## [Do](https://hoytartcenter.org/whats-happening/)

[**Participate**](https://hoytartcenter.org/events-calendar/) in **[engaging events](https://hoytartcenter.org/whats-happening/annual-events/)** and [**experiences**](https://hoytartcenter.org/events-calendar/) on and off-site.

## Period House

### Closed Until February 1

The Alex Crawford Hoyt Period House will be closed to tours in January as we prepare for the new Innovations Tour! Check back soon for tour details!
